title: Black Coffee
description: Black coffee is as simple as it gets with ground coffee beans steeped in hot water, served hot. And if you want to sound fancy, you can call black coffee by its proper name: café noir.

title: Latte
description: As the most popular coffee drink out there, latte consists of a shot of espresso and steamed milk with just a touch of foam. It can be ordered plain or flavored with anything from vanilla to pumpkin spice.

title: Caramel Latte
description: If you enjoy lattes with a special flavor, caramel latte might be the best choice to give you an experience of the natural sweetness and creaminess of steamed milk and caramel.

title: Cappuccino
description: Cappuccino is a latte made with more foam than steamed milk, often with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top. Sometimes you can find variations that use cream instead of milk or ones that add flavorings as well.

title: Americano
description: With a similar taste to black coffee, americano consists of an espresso shot diluted with hot water.

title: Espresso
description: An espresso shot can be served alone or used as the base for most coffee drinks, like lattes and macchiatos.

title: Macchiato
description: Macchiato is another espresso-based drink that has a small amount of foam on top. It's the happy medium between a cappuccino and a doppio.

title: Mocha
description: For all the chocolate lovers out there, you'll fall in love with a mocha. Mocha is a chocolate espresso drink with steamed milk and foam.

title: Hot Chocolate
description: During cold winter days, a cup of hot chocolate will make you feel cozy and happy. It'll also make you feel good because it contains energizing caffeine.

title: Chai Latte
description: If you're looking for a flavorful hot drink in the middle of winter, choose chai latte. The combination of cardamom and cinnamon provides a wonderful taste.

title: Matcha Latte
description: Matcha latte is a green, healthy coffee drink made with finely ground matcha tea and milk, offering mild sweetness, a unique flavor, and a gentle caffeine kick.

title: Seasonal Brew
description: Seasonal coffee with different flavor notes like caramel, fruit, and chocolate

title: Black Tea
description: Black tea was born in China. It's made from leaves of a plant called Camellia and can be flavored differently with fruits for example. A nice, warm, flavorful, and aromatic drink suitable for everyday life.

title: Iced Latte
description: Iced latte is a chilled coffee drink made by mixing espresso and chilled milk. It's served with ice cubes and is also known as iced café latte or latte on the rocks.

title: Iced Mocha Latte
description: Iced mocha latte is a combination of latte and mocha, which in itself is a combination of chocolate and coffee. It gives cold drink lovers a delicious experience of chocolate and coffee.

title: Frapino Caramel
description: It's a blended or rather shaken coffee with whipped cream on top. A must for hot summer days.

title: Frapino Mocha
description: Yet another famous and delicious cold drink for those who prefer chocolate. Imagine the taste of a shake with chocolate and whipped cream on top.

title: Orange Juice
description: We have nothing to say about our freshly squeezed orange juice. You have to try it yourself.

title: Frozen Lemonade
description: Frozen lemonade is a refreshing summer drink that combines fresh-squeezed lemon juice, ice, and sweetener into a cooling, tart, and tangy flavor sensation.

title: Lemonade
description: Was famous in Paris first and then became very popular all over Europe. This sweet, colorless, carbonated beverage is made by mixing lemon juice and carbonated water.
